howToWork.title: Set up your wallet
howToWork.text: Once youâ€™ve set up your wallet of choice, connect it to OpenSea by clicking the NFT Marketplace in the top right corner. Learn about the wallets we support.

howToWork.title: Add your NFTs
howToWork.text: Upload your work (image, video, audio, or 3D art), add a title and description, and customize your NFTs with properties, stats, and unlockable content.

howToWork.title: List them for sale
howToWork.text: Choose between auctions, fixed-price listings, and declining-price listings. You choose how you want to sell your NFTs!
